main.name: Vatsal Safaya
main.occupation: A Freelance Developer and A Student for life
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe, Learning, Creativity and Development
main.bio: Hi there! I am Vatsal! You might also know me as TheCode5. I've been coding for over 6 years now. As a Frontend developer I've worked both with startups and small scale businesses to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in teaching and helping students to excel and pursue their dreams as a developers. With this passion, I have now trained some students across the globe. Through live coaching sessions on colaborating with different teaching institutions, I have accumulated good feedback, demonstrating how to apply developer skills in a range of cool builds. I deliver REAL VALUE by teaching REAL WORLD projects to help students enter the world of web development. You’ll get hands-on experience and learn the skills that are required to succeed in the real-world in this community.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the TheCode5 fam!

education.description: Volunteered at Lakshya 2k19 & TFUG Ahmedabad. Organised an event for TFUG Ahmedabad & Flutter Ahmedabad. Active member at TFUG Sydney, GDG(Ahmedabad, Mumbai, Pune, Baroda, Coimbatore & Gandhinagar). Exploring new opportunities, been a member at Robocon LDCE technical team, Team to represent India Internationally in NGWA Challenge & Robosub 2019.

work.title: App Developer
work.description: Designed, developed, and troubleshot software programs for databases and applications in Kotlin and SQL. Developed some applications, added new features & debugged codes in Kotlin, Swift & Dart. Worked as a Native Application Developer in both Android & iOS. Currently working as a Cross-Platform Application Developer. Turned in projects an average of 5% faster than targets. Worked with both SQL & NoSQL databases

work.title: Graphic Designer
work.description: Created custom graphics sets for clients, with 99% client satisfaction scores. Handled all composition, color, illustration, typography, and branding for client projects. Turned in projects an average of 5% faster than targets. Created custom graphics sets for clients, with 99% client satisfaction scores

work.title: Data Science
work.description: Developed an ML prototype for detecting licence plates, verifying the owner & parking spot detection. Developed an ML prototype for collecting valuable information from a resume in any format. Increased the efficiency of these models by around 90%

work.title: Teacher
work.description: Learned how to deal with students. How to make sessions more enjoyable & interactive. How to teach students of different ages. Taught Python Data Structures & Algorithms - Tips on improving coding skills. Career tips. Teaching new topics. Taught students between age groups 16-22. Technologies taught: Python, Dart(Flutter), Git & Github

work.title: Campus Ambassador
work.description: Campus Ambassador at Simplilearn. Given a conversion rate of over 40 - 50% every month. Increased the company's business by 5% each month

work.title: Student Coordinator & Mentor
work.description: Coordinator at SSIP. Medium between mentors & startups. Mentoring 2 startups incubated at SSIP GTU. Technical guide for 1 startup

work.title: Team Member
work.description: Helped in developing the algorithm for increasing the robot's efficiency. Increased the robot's efficiency by over 40% in different aspects. Stood 7th nationally

work.title: Web Designer
work.description: Designed a website for my friend's startup. Redesign some websites for my clients. Designed custom graphics for a local print shop. Improved UX for website for a local church. Created custom graphics sets for clients, with 99% client satisfaction scores

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Developed my own school's website. Developed a website for our school event with my team. Adapted front-end technologies to follow back-end development using React. Developed website components in JavaScript based on functional requirements and specifications

testimonials.text: Vatsal is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Vatsal has been AWESOME, he makes learning programming so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
It has been great working with Vatsal in a project & with him you learn a lot and that too in an easier way
Extremely skillful at his functional area, abundant knowledge, balanced personality and his unique way of handling his team makes his a wonderful leader.

Vatsal is a dedicated, result driven leader and thoughtful individual. If you ever need someone to deliver under pressure, no slip-ups, just results, he’s the one! He is great in dealing with difficult situations and a fantastic problem solver.
Extremely skillful at his functional area, abundant knowledge, balanced personality and a unique way of team handling makes him a wonderful leader.

He has created so many websites for us and for each one he has worked as a partner. We are glad that he is associated with us as he provides his valuable advise on what needs to be done and how to go about it.
